00020     ArrayList<Schedule.Data> list;
00021     DbObject provider;

00024     String rows[][] = {
00025         {"1", "Arsenal", "Everton"},
00026         {"1", "Chelsea", "ManU"},
00027         {"1", "Fulham", "Blackburn"},
00028         {"1", "Tottenham", "Bolton"}

00031     public MainTableModel() {
00032         provider = new ScheatorDb.Schedule();
00033         
00034         org.jdesktop.application.ResourceMap resourceMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getResourceMap(MainTableModel.class);
00035         //javax.swing.ActionMap actionMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getActionMap(MainTableModel.class, this);
00036 
00037         columns[0] = resourceMap.getString("ColRound.text");
00038         columns[1] = resourceMap.getString("ColHome.text");
00039         columns[2] = resourceMap.getString("ColAway.text");
00040 
00041     }
00042     public int getRowCount() {
00043         return rows.length;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public int getColumnCount() {
00047         return columns.length;
00048     }

00050     @Override
00051     public String getColumnName(int columnIndex) {
00052         return columns[columnIndex];

00054     
00055     public Object getValueAt(int row, int column) {
00056         return rows[row][column];
00057     }

00064     public void moveMatch(int start, int end) {
00065         String tmp[];
00066 
00067         tmp = rows[end];
00068 
00069         if (start > end) {
00070             for(int i=rows.length;i>0;i--) {
00071                 if (i == start) {
00072                     tmp = rows[i];
00073                 } else if (i == end) {
00074                     rows[i+1] = rows[i];
00075                     rows[i] = tmp;
00076                     break;
00077                 } else if (i < start) {
00078                     rows[i+1] = rows[i];
00079                 }
00080             }
00081         } else {
00082             for(int i=0;i<rows.length-1;i++) {
00083                 if (i == start) {
00084                     tmp = rows[i];
00085                     //rows[i] = rows[i+1];
00086                 } else if (i == end) {
00087                     rows[i-1] = rows[i];
00088                     rows[i] = tmp;
00089                     break;
00090                 } else if (i > start)
00091                     rows[i-1] = rows[i];
00092             }
00093         }
00094         System.err.println("Row moved");
00095         fireTableDataChanged();
00096     }
00097 
00102     public void update(int seasonId) {
00103         provider.fetch(seasonId);
00104         fireTableDataChanged();
00105     }
00106 
00107     public void save() {
00108         System.err.println("Table saved");
00109     }
